title: Consumatic
brief_description: A product of a final year research project from the Victoria University of Technology (VUT) Advanced Diploma of Arts (Electronic Design and Interactive Media) course. Consumatic is a dystopic view of consumerism structured around a journey through the urban environment of Melbourne.
